com.sleepysim

Class Naive_adversary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepysim.Naive_adversary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adversary

    public class Naive_adversary
extends java.lang.Object
implements Adversary
    This class implements the Naive_adversary algorithm
    A naive adversary, you should break consistency if you have more node than honest

                       java.lang.Boolean[] is_corrupted,
                       java.util.ArrayList<javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.security.PrivateKey>> secret_key_table,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.security.PublicKey> public_key_table,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Corrupted_node> corrupt,
                       java.lang.Integer T,
                       Controller controller,
                       Network_control net)
        Parameters:
        n - - number of corrupted nodes
        is_corrupted - - the boolean array which records which nodes are corrupted
        secret_key_table - - secret key for each corrupted node, the Integer is node id, and String is the corresponding secret key
        public_key_table - - public keys
        corrupt - - all corrupted nodes
        T - - inconsistency threshold
        controller -
        net -
